meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a bean.
meanings.sent1: The beany soup had a strong bean flavor.
meanings.sent2: The beany texture of the fabric felt rough.
meanings.sent3: The beany smell of the coffee made her crave a cup.
meanings.sent4: His beany personality was warm and comforting like a bowl of soup.
meanings.sent5: The beany color of the car reminded her of fresh green beans.

meanings.definition: A small, round seed of a plant, widely used for food.
meanings.sent1: She planted the beany in the soil and watched it grow.
meanings.sent2: The chef used the beany to make a delicious stew.
meanings.sent3: The beany rolled off the plate and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The beany was like a tiny treasure in the palm of her hand.
meanings.sent5: The beany soup was a comforting meal on a cold day.

meanings.definition: A type of hat with a small, close-fitting brim.
meanings.sent1: He tipped his beany to greet his friend.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beany to keep her head warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The beany flew off his head in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: The beany perched jauntily on top of her head.
meanings.sent5: The beany shielded his eyes from the bright sun.
